2021 was a challenging unique year we

may have told you about on cnn every

we had a long time in vietnam with

about july vietnam had made it through
three corona waves pretty successfully
but wave number four was the final wave
this was the wave that could not be
undone no matter what actions they took
the virus spread throughout the
